briefTitle: Comparing Patient Satisfaction of the Abdomen After DIEAP Procedure and Conventional Abdominoplasty
officialTitle: Comparing Patient Satisfaction of the Abdomen After DIEAP Procedure and Conventional Abdominoplasty
conditions: Donor Site Complication, Satisfaction, Personal, Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Comparing patient satisfaction of the abdomen after DIEAP procedure and conventional abdominoplasty
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* unilateral DIEAP flap, abdominoplasty

Exclusion Criteria:

* bilateral DIEAP flap, progressive cancer disease
